issue.title: Allow Flatbuffers and RapidJSON to be used locally on Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-922](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-922). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Building flatbuffers takes quite a while, we should let people use whatever's in `FLATBUFFERS_HOME` on Windows. This current doesn't work because `FindFlatbuffers.cmake` assumes there are no spaces in `FLATBUFFERS_HOME`.
